justification: The avoidance of pork by family members is explicitly justified by the belief that pork is toxic.

justification: The interviewee's daily meat consumption is explicitly linked to increased meat intake after pregnancy.
Eating meat daily is explicitly supported by the feeling of fullness it provides.

The satisfaction of cravings explicitly supports daily meat consumption.

stance_1: I want to rid my body of toxins
justification: The desire to rid the body of toxins explicitly motivates the intention to start fasting.
